name: Timmy's Stick Adventures
description:
Timmy's Stick Adventures is an RPG Puzzle Adventure game created using RPG Maker 2003.  The game 's development has started a few weeks ago.  Your goal in this game is to lead Timmy into the end of his quest to discover his lost identity.  The game features many unique RPG features such as a dashing ability and a weirdly creative story and plot. 

Your role on Timmy's life

You are Timmy. You don't know where you are or what you are doing.  Will you  uncover the hidden secrets of  the land where you landed? Timmy's desicions is up to you. There is no right or wrong answer, but certain decisions may change the game Forever.
